data.eml:eml: A new species of Gamasiphis Berlese (Acari: Ologamasidae) from North Asia, with a key to the Eurasian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marchenko, Irina I. (2013): A new species of Gamasiphis Berlese (Acari: Ologamasidae) from North Asia, with a key to the Eurasian species. Zootaxa 3626 (3): 381-390, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.3.6
